summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 1 November to end of Wednesday 3 November GMT
description: Weather fronts arriving from the Atlantic will affect the weather in Greater London. <br/>Any early fog patches will clear, with sunny periods following for most. Most parts staying dry, although the odd shower cannot be completely ruled out. Light winds, but feeling rather cool. The fresh breeze will disperse local emissions and little imported pollution. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
